test-case.name: fn-matches2args-1
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "matches" function with the arguments set as follows: $input = xs:string(lower bound) $pattern = xs:string(lower bound).

test-case.name: fn-matches2args-2
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "matches" function with the arguments set as follows: $input = xs:string(mid range) $pattern = xs:string(lower bound).

test-case.name: fn-matches2args-3
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "matches" function with the arguments set as follows: $input = xs:string(upper bound) $pattern = xs:string(lower bound).

test-case.name: fn-matches2args-4
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "matches" function with the arguments set as follows: $input = xs:string(lower bound) $pattern = xs:string(mid range).

test-case.name: fn-matches2args-5
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "matches" function with the arguments set as follows: $input = xs:string(lower bound) $pattern = xs:string(upper bound).

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-MatchesFunc-1
test-case.description: The pattern can't be the empty sequence.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-MatchesFunc-2
test-case.description: fn:matches() takes at least two arguments, not one.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-MatchesFunc-3
test-case.description: The third argument cannot be the empty sequence.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-MatchesFunc-4
test-case.description: Only three arguments are accepted.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-MatchesFunc-5
test-case.description: The flags argument cannot contain whitespace.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-MatchesFunc-6
test-case.description: The flags argument cannot contain 'X'.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-MatchesFunc-1
test-case.description: Whitespace in the regexp is collapsed.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-MatchesFunc-2
test-case.description: Whitespace(before) in the regexp is collapsed, but not inside a character class.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-MatchesFunc-3
test-case.description: Whitespace(after) in the regexp is collapsed, but not inside a character class.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-MatchesFunc-4
test-case.description: Whitespace(in the middle) in the regexp is collapsed, but not inside a character class.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-MatchesFunc-5
test-case.description: whitespace in the regexp is collapsed, and should therefore compile.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-MatchesFunc-6
test-case.description: whitespace in the regexp is collapsed completely, and should therefore compile and match.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-MatchesFunc-7
test-case.description: whitespace in the regexp is not collapsed, and should therefore not compile.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-MatchesFunc-8
test-case.description: Since no string is captured by the back-reference, the single character is matched.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-MatchesFunc-9
test-case.description: Since no string is captured by the back-reference, the single character is matched(#2).

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-MatchesFunc-10
test-case.description: A non-matching backwards-reference matches the empty string.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-MatchesFunc-11
test-case.description: Use a back reference inside a character class.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-MatchesFunc-12
test-case.description: Use a back reference inside a character class(#2).

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-MatchesFunc-13
test-case.description: Use a back reference inside a character class(#3).

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-MatchesFunc-14
test-case.description: Use a back reference inside a character class(#3).

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-MatchesFunc-15
test-case.description: A negative character class never match a non-character.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-MatchesFunc-16
test-case.description: Use a pattern whose interpretation is unknown. See public report 4466.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-MatchesFunc-17
test-case.description: Caseless match with back-reference.
